calculator

Class NumStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • calculator.NumStack

  • public class NumStack
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for number stack.

    This is a facade class to hide the details on the implementation of a
    stack of numbers.

    Author:
    Bruce

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        A method to see if the stack is empty or not.
        Returns:
        true if the size of stack is 0, otherwise false.

      • push

        public void push(float i)
        A method to push a number into the stack.
        Parameters:
        i - the number to be push in.

      • pop

        public float pop()
          throws java.util.EmptyStackException
        A method to get and remove the top number from a stack.

        If the type does not match, it will also catch BadTypeException.

        Returns:
        the top number in the stack
        Throws:
        java.util.EmptyStackException - when the stack is empty.
